document_data.name: One Foot in the Boat
document_data.mainbody: '''One Foot in the Boat''' was a bustling tavern found in the city of [[Yartar]]. It was favored by merchants and [[adventurer]]s alike, by both Yartarran residents and traders from neighboring settlements and beyond.

Location.Atmosphere: The tavern was a noisy and outright exciting place to spend an evening. It often left its patrons with fond memories that were slightly better when remembered than when they actually played out.

document_data.Rumors & Legends: It was a great place to hear outlandish stories and possibly even hear about some grand plot with which a group of adventurers could involve themselves.
